attributes.action: Halt the mass murder of Palestinians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce blanket sanctions against Israel for it acts of genocide against the Palestinian peoples.

rejection.details: While we have accepted several petitions relating to government policy in the Middle East, we do ask users to refrain from using intemperate vocabulary.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
